amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to prohibiting attacks on Federal employees by protecting legally binding collective bargaining agreements and the right to organize.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1466 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 175.

action.text: Amendment SA 1466 proposed by Senator Alsobrooks to Amendment SA 1717.
